item.title: I-5 North - Exits 256A, 256B, and 257
item.description: I-5 north at Exit 256A - WA-539 North/Meridian St./Lynden. Also at Exit 256B - Bellis Fair Mall. Approaching Exit 257 - Northwest Ave.

item.title: I-5 North - Exits 256A and 256B
item.description: I-5 north approaching Exit 256A - WA-539 North/Meridian St./Lynden. Approaching Exit 256B - Bellis Fair Mall.

item.title: I-5 North - Exits 256A-B
item.description: I-5 north approaching Exits 256A-B - WA-539 North/Meridian St./Bellis Fair Mall. WA-539 leads to two of the border crossings into Canada in Whatcom County.

item.title: Port Of Lynden Hours
item.description: Port of Lynden hours and alternate Ports of Entry at the Canada/US Boundary.

item.title: WA-539 North At Canada Customs
item.description: WA-539 north approaching Canada Customs - Be Prepared To Stop.

item.title: WA-539 South - Leaving US Customs
item.description: WA-539 south leaving the US Customs facility.
